summary: Provides a hierarchical attention network implementation for heterogeneous graphs, leveraging DGL's metapath reachable graph to perform multi‑head graph attention across various meta‑paths and a semantic attention mechanism to fuse the resulting embeddings into node representations.
business_intent: Demonstrates how to construct and apply a HAN model on a custom heterogeneous dataset, serving as a reference for researchers and developers building graph neural network solutions for heterogeneous data.
